summary: This is an email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York regarding the drafting and circulation of an update memo for the Office of the Deputy Attorney General (ODAG) concerning the Epstein case. It references prior memos and seeks feedback.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: Author of the email, responsible for drafting and circulating an ODAG update memo on the Epstein case.

events.title: ODAG Update Memo Drafting
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney drafts and circulates an update memo for the Office of the Deputy Attorney General regarding the Epstein case, following up on two prior memos.
personsInvolved: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: An update memo for the Office of the Deputy Attorney General (ODAG) regarding the Epstein case was drafted and circulated on June 19, 2019.
The memo was prepared by an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York, following up on two prior such memos.
The email indicates ongoing high-level oversight and coordination within the Department of Justice on the Epstein case in mid-2019.
